channel.title: Your recordings
channel.description:
Today I went to a friend's house and we recorded a cover of the song "CKY - Escape From Hellview". You can listen to it [url=http://www.upload-mp3.com/files/70671_25fr8/hellview.mp3]here[/url]. We used Ableton Live 7, 8 has some weird latency bug, for recording, and we used two ibanez guitars, a bass, a line 6 pod xt live (mine), a line 6 toneport, asio4all to record at the same time and ezdrummer from the drums.
ITT: Post your own recordings.

item.title: Your recordings
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:2, topic:290891”]Here’s my creation.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rVg4YUmM2ns

Was made in cubase 3, using my guitar, and seeing as I didn’t have a microphone I used some recordings I found from a guy who was using his mic to talk over msn to me once. With this I created sexy dave. Probably one of the best tracks ever made by man. Prepare.[/quote]

After listening to your chocolate rain remix many times it started to sound like he was saying “lead chalk”.

Read full topic

item.title: Your recordings
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Yeah 8 doesn’t even seem to have any added value for me as a guitarist nomsain.
There’s only shitty digital instruments or something like that.
Did you have stuttering while recording thru asio btw?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 02 September 2009, 20:46:07[/size][hr]I recorded a little test for a sweeper effect today, playing some notes from both the major scale and the minor pentatonic scale
http://www.upload-mp3.com/files/91509_qhovg/sweeper.mp3
Rate/hate/masturbate.

Edit: I listened to the hellview recording again, and the part where one of us forgot what to play and improvises sounds really well with the song!

Read full topic

item.description:

i dont do a lot of recording, its mostly sequencing these days do i still count

ps its weird you have that problem with live8, cuz so did i, its fucking shitty, and everyone told me it was me doing it wrong even tho 7 is fine
